description: A small ensemble of uncoupled (atmosphere and land) simulations from 1850-2014 in which sea surface temperature (SST) and sea ice distributions are specified and vegetation may interact.  Specified aerosol forcings to be consistent with the historical forcing used in the DAMIP experiments.
keywords: RFMIP, Tier 2, Historical, Aerosol forcing, specified aerosol, atmosphere-land
long_name: RFMIP historical aerosol forcing with specified aerosols and control SST
rationale: To be used in detection and attribution experiments.
